duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform on-site roadway worker protection and job site coordination on live railroad tracks.
Communicate with dispatchers and trains to ensure safety and coordination of activities.
Identify and correct safety issues on the job site according to railroad regulations.
Provide On-Track Safety in controlled and non-controlled track areas.

education_certification.credential: 2 years of direct railroad experience in Maintenance of Way (MOW) department as a RWIC or similar role
